Default		These components generally normalize HTML elements for cross browser functionality and add some very basic styling
Layout		Apply our fully responsive fluid grid system and panels and useful utility classes.
Element	        A basic building block of a website, exists alone or in homogenous groups
Collection	A heterogeneous group of several elements which can usually be found together.
View		A way to present common website content like comments, activity feeds
Addon		An element that is not based within the core structure but can be added ontop of the core

Component	Components abstract recurring parts of a website into class-based modules, like buttons for example. These can be reused and combined.
Sub-object	Sub-objects are placed within a component to enhance its funtionality, for example a close button in an alert box.
Modifier	Modifier classes alter the style of components and their sub-objects, like button colors and sizes.
